sentences.sContent: In 1498, Columbus ever been to Columbia coast.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1498, Columbus ever been to Columbia coast.
sentences.sCn: 1498年，哥伦布曾到过哥伦比亚海岸。

sentences.sContent: Well, I might want to go to Columbia. But I might not.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, I might want to go to Columbia. But I might not.
sentences.sCn: 我可能想去读哥伦比亚大学，但也可能不想。

sentences.sContent: He received a doctorate of philosophy in political science at Columbia University.
sentences.sContent_eng: He received a doctorate of philosophy in political science at Columbia University.
sentences.sCn: 他获哥伦比亚大学政治学博士学位。

phrases.pCn: n. 不列颠哥伦比亚（省名，位于加拿大西部）
n. （美国纽约州）哥伦比亚大学
哥伦比亚特区（美国联邦直辖区）

trans.tranOther: the first test vehicle of the NASA space shuttle fleet to prove the possibility of routine access to space for scientific and commercial ventures
